mapper.insert: insert into review(reviewnum, reviewdetail, userid, connectid, type) values(#{reviewnum},#{reviewdetail},#{userid},#{connectid}, 'd')
mapper.select: select * from review where userid=#{userid} order by reviewnum desc limit 1
select * from review where type='d' order by reviewnum desc limit 3
select count(reviewnum) from review where connectid=#{dBoardnum}
mapper.update: update review set reviewdetail=#{reviewdetail}, reviewdate=now() where reviewnum=#{reviewnum}
mapper.select: select reviewnum, reviewdetail, userid, DATE_FORMAT(reviewdate, '%Y-%m-%d') as reviewdate, star, connectid, type from review where connectid = #{sBoardnum} and type = 'm' order by reviewnum desc
